info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: 1.76 MHz
collection.openText: This is a recording of the day we must never forget.

specialTipSize.specialTip: The higher the Agent’s Fortitude was, the lower their Success Rate when working with $0. It may be due to the fact that violent tendencies flare rapidly due to $0’s influence.
When the work result was Normal, the Qliphoth Counter lowered with a normal probability.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter lowered with a high probability.
When employee #0 panicked during work, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When the work result was Good, the Qliphoth Counter increased. When all E-Boxes were produced as PE-Boxes, the Counter increased by 2.

The surveillance camera detected various noises emitting around the facility. Based on the fact that this occurred after $0’s Qliphoth Counter reached 0, it can be assumed that the noise originated from $0’s Containment Unit.
The number of sections affected by the noise steadily increased until the Qliphoth Counter of $0 was completely recovered.
